mapper.select: SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, SEQ, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, ROWNUM AS SEQ, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER ORDER BY U_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE U_ID=#{uId}

SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, SEQ, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, ROWNUM AS SEQ, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM (SELECT U_ID, MEM_TYPE_ID, U_NAME, U_EMAIL, U_NICK, U_TEL, U_REG_DATE, U_MARKETING, U_GENDER, U_BIRTH, U_GOOGLE_LOGIN, U_NAVER_LOGIN, U_KAKAO_LOGIN FROM MEMBER WHERE U_REG_DATE BETWEEN TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') AND TO_TIMESTAMP(#{searchDTO.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS.xff') ORDER BY U_ID) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET U_NAME=#{uName}, U_EMAIL=#{uEmail}, U_NICK=#{uNick}, U_PW=#{uPw}, U_TEL=#{uTel} WHERE U_ID=#{uId}
mapper.select: SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SEQ, U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, ROWNUM AS SEQ, U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT M.U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, M.U_ID, M.POST_TYPE_ID, M.U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, M.U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, M.U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, M.COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, M.COMMUNITY_VIEW_CNT, M.COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY M LEFT OUTER JOIN POST_TYPE P ON M.POST_TYPE_ID = P.POST_TYPE_ID WHERE U_ID=#{uId} ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}
